albums.title: Bangerz!
albums.label: RCA
albums.comment: Limited Edition, Reissue, Sea Glass. 10th anniversary edition with updated packaging featuring never before seen photos and the bonus track "23"

albums.title: Wasn't Built In A Day
albums.label: de Rap Winkel Records
albums.comment: Limited to 750 copies on black vinyl.

albums.title: E. 1999 Eternal
albums.label: Ruthless Records
albums.comment: 2023 VMP reissue, remastered. Exclusive art print and listening notes book. So excited to have a copy of this brilliant album, it sounds stunning!

albums.title: Uncontrolled Substance
albums.label: Loud Records
albums.comment: 2023 VMP reissue, remastered. Comes with record commentary by Stephen Potter. Gorgeous cover, gorgeous record, great album!

albums.title: The Documentary
albums.label: Interscope Records
albums.comment: 2022 VMP reissue, remastered. Comes with listening notes by Paul Thompson. These Dre beats sound so good when loud!

albums.title: Tical
albums.label: Def Jam
albums.comment: 2019 VPM reissue, remastered. Crisp and clear quality.

albums.title: Enema Of The State
albums.label: Geffen Records
albums.comment: Limited edition clear vinyl part of the 'HMV 1921 2021 100th Anniversary' celebration. A classic album to have in the collection.

albums.title: Speak Now (Taylor's Version)
albums.label: Republic Records
albums.comment: Was supposed to be the Orchid Marbled version but ended up with Violet Marbeled. Oh well.

albums.title: Liquid Swords
albums.label: Geffen
albums.comment: Reissue. I've been after a copy of Liquid Swords for a long time. This is my favourite of the Wu solo releases.

albums.title: Greatest Hits: My Prerogative
albums.label: Jive
albums.comment: Limited Edition, Reissue, Cream.

albums.title: In The Zone
albums.label: Jive
albums.comment: Limited Edition, Reissue, Blue.

albums.title: Britney
albums.label: Jive
albums.comment: Limited Edition, Reissue, Yellow.

albums.title: Oops!...I Did It Again
albums.label: Jive
albums.comment: Limited Edition, Reissue, Purple.

albums.title: Return to the 36 Chambers: The Dirty Version
albums.label: Rhino Records, Elektra
albums.comment: Record Store Day, Limited Edition, Picture Disc, Reissue, Remastered.

albums.title: Endless Summer Vacation
albums.label: Columbia
albums.comment: Sold through the official Miley Cyrus U.S. website. Standard black, this is the one I play on the record player.

albums.title: Endless Summer Vacation
albums.label: Columbia
albums.comment: Sold through the official Miley Cyrus U.S. website and marketed as Exclusive Limited Edition Endless Summer Vacation Red Vinyl.

albums.title: Endless Summer Vacation
albums.label: Columbia
albums.comment: Sold through the official Miley Cyrus U.S. website and marketed as Exclusive Limited Edition Endless Summer Vacation Crystal Clear Vinyl.

albums.title: Endless Summer Vacation
albums.label: Columbia
albums.comment: Limited Edition White. This was available at retail stores across the world.

albums.title: Only Built 4 Cuban Linx...
albums.label: Get On Down
albums.comment: 2022 Release with two different purple vinyl LPs.

albums.title: Wu-Tang Forever
albums.label: Loud Records, RCA
albums.comment: 4 x Vinyl, LP, Album, Reissue, Repress, 180g.

albums.title: Enter The Wu-Tang (36 Chambers)
albums.label: RCA, Loud Records
albums.comment: 2016, 180 gram reissue.

albums.title: III - Temples Of Boom
albums.label: Ruffhouse Records, Columbia
albums.comment: 2017, 180 gram reissue.

albums.title: What Has Been Blessed Cannot Be Cursed
albums.artist: Conway The Machine x Big Ghost
albums.label: de Rap Winkel Records
albums.comment: In My Soul variant limited to 500 copies. The third collab between Conway & Big Ghost. Red Beams goes hard.

albums.title: Based On A True Story
albums.label: The Drop
albums.comment: A certified Aotearoa classic. Listening to the album front to back takes you on a journey. Enjoy it.

albums.title: Betty
albums.comment: Local artist, lovely album.

albums.title: Expert In A Dying Field
albums.label: Ivy League Records
albums.comment: Purchased at their September show at the Opera House, Wellington.

albums.title: Super What?
albums.label: Silver Age
albums.comment: Iconic team up. Dope artwork by Lamour Supreme.

albums.title: Every Hero Needs A Villain
albums.label: Brick Records
albums.comment: Great second album from Czarface. Dope artwork by Lamour Supreme.

albums.title: Good Kid, M.A.A.d City
albums.label: TDE
albums.comment: 180g, 10th Anniversary Edition. A short film by Kendrick Lamar.

albums.title: The Missing Bricks
albums.label: de Rap Winkel Records
albums.comment: Collection of records that were unable to have samples cleared for Conway's official releases.

albums.title: Wairunga
albums.label: The Drop
albums.comment: 180 grams. A beautiful album. Recorded live in Maraetotara at Wairunga on 16 March 2021.

albums.title: La Maquina
albums.label: de Rap Winkel Records
albums.comment: Limited to 1000 copies on Lila coloured vinyl.

albums.title: The Odd Czar Against Us
albums.label: Silver Age
albums.comment: Standard black release. Dope artwork by Lamour Supreme.

albums.title: Czarface Meets Ghostface
albums.label: Silver Age
albums.comment: Standard black release. Dope artwork by Lamour Supreme.

albums.title: #1's
albums.label: Columbia
albums.comment: Record Store Day 2022 exclusive release of the original 1998 release. 7050 copies. Includes the track Fantasy featuing ODB.

albums.title: Czarmageddon
albums.label: Silver Age
albums.comment: Released on Record Store Day 2022.

albums.title: Ironman
albums.label: Music On Vinyl
albums.comment: Classic album. 180 gram audiophile vinyl. Deluxe heavyweight gatefold sleeve with leather laminate. 25th Anniversary edition of 4000 numbered copies.

albums.title: Friday Forever
albums.label: XL Recordings
albums.comment: Dope album. 03:15 AM / Caviar goes hard.

albums.title: The Time Of Our Lives
albums.label: Hollywood Records
albums.comment: Urban Outfitters exclusive release. Limited edition puriple splattered white vinyl.

albums.title: Navigator
albums.label: Sony Music
albums.comment: A pioneer of Aotearoa Hip Hop. 20th Anniversary Pounamu Green Vinyl version. Features only 12 of the original 15 from the CD release. Missing Rootsman, Interlude 2, and The Natural.

albums.title: Love & Disrespect
albums.label: Universal Music New Zealand
albums.comment: Top local band from my youth. Their music was never released on vinyl at the time so 3 of their albums were pressed and released in 2021. Includes insert with lyrics and notes from the band members.

albums.title: Fearless (Taylor's Version)
albums.label: Republic Records
albums.comment: Heavy. 6 panel, triple gatefold jacket with 3 gold coloured records. Lots of music.

albums.title: The Studio Recordings Part 2
albums.label: Loop
albums.comment: Fly My Pretties is a collaboration of musicians originally from Wellington, New Zealand who are known for coming together to record live albums, in various locations in New Zealand. Purchased this at one of their live shows in 2020.

albums.title: The Studio Recordings Part 1
albums.label: Loop
albums.comment: Fly My Pretties is a collaboration of musicians originally from Wellington, New Zealand who are known for coming together to record live albums, in various locations in New Zealand. Purchased this at one of their live shows in 2020. Feautres the song Singing In My Soul, a special one for my wife and I.

albums.title: LULU
albums.label: ALC Black
albums.comment: ALC Records varient. Includes original album + instrumentals.

albums.title: The Plugs I Met
albums.label: de Rap Winkel Records
albums.comment: The album was released in July 2019 while I was travelling Europe. The vinyl pre-sale went on the De Rap Winkel website while I was at the Glastonbury music festival 2019, sitting by the Glastonbury sign and looking over the festival. It was great that I was in the correct time zone when a Griselda project went up for sale.

albums.title: The Marshall Mathers LP
albums.label: Aftermath Entertainment
albums.comment: Certified classic. 180 gram reissue.

albums.title: The Eminem Show
albums.label: Aftermath Entertainment
albums.comment: Certified classic. Reissue. Double LP, insert includes lyrics and linear notes.

albums.title: Kamikaze
albums.label: Shady Records
albums.comment: They sent me two copies. One to enjoy, one to collect.

albums.title: Music To Be Murdered By
albums.label: Shady Records
albums.comment: Pre-ordered on release day. This is an alternate cover splatter vinyl that was available exclusively on his website for a limited time. Lock It Up goes hard.

albums.title: Tickets To My Downfall
albums.label: Bad Boy Entertainment
albums.comment: Original album cover varient. What a bop. I exercise my right to seperate the music from the artist in the context of listen to this record. Part of the Travis Barker Pop Punk revival movement.

albums.title: Plastic Hearts
albums.label: RCA
albums.comment: ABSOLUTE BANGER. My most listened to album from 2020-2022.

albums.title: The Legacy
albums.label: Def Jam
albums.comment: Compilation, Limited Edition, Red Vinyl. Black Friday RSD exclusive; first time on vinyl. Includes censored version of Slippin'.

albums.title: If It Bleeds It Can Be Killed
albums.artist: Conway The Machine x Big Ghost
albums.label: de Rap Winkel Records
albums.comment: Limited Edition, Numbered. Second collab between Conway & Big Ghost. Red Beams goes hard.

albums.title: No One Mourns The Wicked
albums.artist: Conway The Machine x Big Ghost
albums.label: de Rap Winkel Records
albums.comment: Black record, limited Edition, numbered. First collab between Conway & Big Ghost. Red Beams goes hard.

singles.title: M.A.D / Lyrics Of My Life
singles.label: Iron Fist Records
singles.comment: Found in an antique store that also stocks records in Greytown.

singles.title: How Come / American Psycho
singles.label: Shady Records
singles.comment: Found in an antique store that also stocks records in Greytown.

singles.title: Nothing Breaks Like A Heart
singles.label: RCA
singles.comment: ABSOLUTE BANGER. Record Store Day 2019. Limited to 1500 copies.

singles.title: WAP
singles.label: Atlantic
singles.comment: Vinyl is the best due to its warm sound and the smooth way it conveys analog recordings. The subtle imperfections such as crackling and popping add to the listening experience, making it my preferred medium for listening to Wet Ass Pussy.

singles.title: Shit On You
singles.label: Shady Records
singles.comment: Includes I Remember - Dedication To Whitey Ford, an absolute banger diss track. Cover artwork by Skam.

singles.title: Fight Music
singles.label: Shady Records
singles.comment: Lifted from the debut album 'Devils Night'. Includes the track Words Are Weapons and a D12 Freestyle.

singles.title: Sing For The Moment
singles.label: Shady Records
singles.comment: Includes the track Rabbit Run. Has instructions for how to get polyphonic ringtons of the track on the back cover.
